subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The usually reliable Jon Niese, who entered the game with a 2.17 E.R.A., had a rough outing as the Mets fell in Washington for their third straight loss.
snippet: The usually reliable Jon Niese, who entered the game with a 2.17 E.R.A., had a rough outing as the Mets fell in Washington for their third straight loss.
